topics.title: About the Newsletter category
topics.excerpt:
This category holds the post archive from our newsletter, The Bullhorn. Subscribe to the category if youâ€™d like a weekly roundup of news from the Ansible Ecosystem! 
To propose a news item for the newsletter, simply hop …
